summary: Integrates Xiaomi MiIO air purifiers and humidifiers as fan entities within Home Assistant, exposing device state, attributes and a rich set of asynchronous services for controlling speed, modes, LED, filter, child lock, buzzer and other device‑specific features.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor, automate and remotely control Xiaomi air quality devices, improving indoor environment management through a unified smart‑home interface.
